data.message: Loved it. But would love to see my video please. It keeps saying its not ready yet . Please

replies.message: Hi Terri. We’re sorry that you’re having trouble sharing your Year in Review video. We understand that this is an issue some of you are experiencing and our team is hard at work to resolve any problems. Thanks for your patience! -Hannah

Sorry to hijack this thread but I never got my video to work either & now it looks like the page has been replaced with a generic 2016 montage video instead of the personalized 2016 video.  I realize you get what you pay for, but it's a bit disappointing as all my friends posted one & my GF was able to generate her's on the same browser on the same computer with no problem.  Well, maybe next year.
